Posts.Content: Jun 25, 2012 11:05AM jancercancer wrote: My surgery went as expected. I'm fortunate in that all lymph nodes were unaffected.  No treatments needed. I'm learning to live w/o my right breast. The way i feel about the severity of the mastectomy leaves me not wanting the reconstruct.I'm told its twice the misery and i'm not ready for that. There's no way of knowing if I will change my mind on this and i'm told there's no time constraint on the insurance...anyway thank you for all your prayers and well wishes and i'm sorry it took me this long to get back to y'all.
